name: rpexpcld
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), crp), wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cz))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (c0[^]c1)∈ ℝ+, c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ ℤ)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), crp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, crp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), crp))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), crp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, crp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), crp))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), crp))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), crp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, crp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))

comment: Closure law for exponentiation of positive reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
